page.title: 04CHIPPERFLD NEW STYLE HOUSING
page.content: {SCATTERDELLS PARK}-Is a settlement of 22 mobile homes (not caravans) set around a clearing of grass and silver birch trees.It has 11 lock-up garages and several parking spaces. Small, neat,colourful,well-tended gardens surround box-shaped,smart,comfortable homes,supported on brick structures. {FACTS FROM SURVEY OF OWNER OCCUPIERS 1. Owners in residence 4 weeks-8 years. Average time less than 3 years. 2. Most had moved from less than 10 miles away. 3. Most preferred mobile home for convenience and economy. 4. All but one liked Chipperfield for the people and peace and quiet.
